original: atha vidyādharakalpaṃ pravakṣye sattvānukampayā /
analyzed: atha vidyādhara kalpam pravakṣye sattva anukampayā

original: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
analyzed: namaḥ buddhāya namaḥ dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya

original: namo bhagavate śākyamunaye mahākāruṇikāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya /
analyzed: namaḥ bhagavate śākyamunaye mahākāruṇikāya tathāgatāya arhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya

original: namaḥ samantebhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ samantebhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyaḥ

original: oṃ giri giri giriṇi giriṇi girivati guṇavati ākāśavati ākāśaviśuddhe sarvapāpavigate
analyzed: om giri giri giriṇi giriṇi girivati guṇavati ākāśavati ākāśa viśuddhe sarva pāpa vigate

original: ākāśe gaganatale ākāśavicāriṇi maṇidhari vajriṇi jvalitaśikhare maṇimuktākhacitamaulidhare
analyzed: ākāśe gagana tale ākāśa vicāriṇi maṇidhari vajriṇi jvalita śikhare maṇi muktā khacita mauli dhare

original: sukeśe suveṣe suvaktre sunetre suvarṇagaure atīte anutpanne anāgate pratyutpanne
analyzed: su keśe su veṣe su vaktre su netre suvarṇa gaure atīte anutpanne anāgate pratyutpanne

original: namaḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ jvalitaujasāṃ buddhe subuddhe bhagavati surakṣaṇi akṣaya sukṣaya
analyzed: namaḥ sarva buddhānām jvalita ojasām buddhe su buddhe bhagavati su rakṣaṇi akṣaya su kṣaya

original: sūkṣme suprabhe sudame sudānte suvrate varade pravare bhagavati bhadravati subhadravati
analyzed: sūkṣme su prabhe su dame su dānte suvrate vara de pravare bhagavati bhadravati subhadravati

original: bhadre subhadre vimale jayabhadre caṇḍi pracaṇḍi caṇḍe vajracaṇḍe mahācaṇḍe gauri
analyzed: bhadre subhadre vimale jayabhadre caṇḍi pracaṇḍi caṇḍe vajracaṇḍe mahācaṇḍe gauri

original: gandhāri caṇḍāli mātaṅgi vaccasi sumati pukkasi sumukhi śabari śāvari śaṃkari dramaṇḍi
analyzed: gandhāri caṇḍāli mātaṅgi vaccasi sumati pukkasi sumukhi śabari śāvari śaṃkari dramaṇḍi

original: drāmaṇḍi raudriṇi sarvārthasādhani paramārthasādhani hana hana sarvaśatrūn daha daha
analyzed: drāmaṇḍi raudriṇi sarva artha sādhani parama artha sādhani hana hana sarva śatrūn daha daha

original: sarvaduṣṭān pretapiśācaḍākinīmanuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāṃ (Pkdh_141)
analyzed: sarva duṣṭān preta piśāca ḍākinī manuṣya amanuṣyāṇām

original: paca hṛdayaṃ vidhvaṃsaya jīvitaṃ sarvaduṣṭagrahāṇāṃ nāśaya naśaya sarvapāpāni me bhagavati /
analyzed: paca hṛdayam vidhvaṃsaya jīvitam sarva duṣṭa grahāṇām nāśaya naśaya sarva pāpāni me bhagavati

original: rakṣa rakṣa mama sarvasattvānāñ ca sarvatra sarvadā sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ /
analyzed: rakṣa rakṣa mama sarva sattvānām ca sarvatra sarvadā sarva bhaya upadravebhyaḥ

original: sarvaduṣṭānāṃ bandhanaṃ kuru kuru /
analyzed: sarva duṣṭānām bandhanam kuru kuru

original: sarvakilviṣanāśani mārtaṇḍe mṛtyudaṇḍe mṛtyudaṇḍanivāriṇi mānande mānini mahāmānini
analyzed: sarva kilviṣa nāśani mārtaṇḍe mṛtyudaṇḍe mṛtyudaṇḍa nivāriṇi mānande mānini mahāmānini

original: mānadhāriṇi cale vicale vimale viṭi viṭi taṭi tiṭi niṭi niṭi tuṭṭe dhoriṇi dhariṇi
analyzed: māna dhāriṇi cale vicale vimale viṭi viṭi taṭi tiṭi niṭi niṭi tuṭṭe dhoriṇi dhariṇi

original: nimiṇi viriṇi vīryaṇi pracale pravarasamare caṇḍāli mātaṅgi rundhasi karasi śarasi
analyzed: nimiṇi viriṇi vīryaṇi pracale pravara samare caṇḍāli mātaṅgi rundhasi karasi śarasi

original: varcasi sumati pukkasi śabari śabari śaṃkari mani draviḍi ḍāviḍi hanani dahani pacani
analyzed: varcasi sumati pukkasi śabari śabari śaṃkari mani draviḍi ḍāviḍi hanani dahani pacani

original: pācani marddani sarali sarale saralambhe hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭavidāriṇi mahiri mahiri mahāmahili
analyzed: pācani marddani sarali sarale hīna madhya utkṛṣṭa vidāriṇi mahiri mahiri mahā mahili

original: nigaḍe nigaḍabhaṃje marte marte matti mattini dāṃte cakre cakravākini jvale jvale
analyzed: nigaḍe nigaḍa bhaṃje marte marte matti mattini dāṃte cakre cakravākini jvale jvale

original: jvalini śabari śābari sarvavyādhihariṇi muni muni cuṇḍi cuṇḍi cuṇḍini cuṇḍini mahācuṇḍini
analyzed: jvalini śabari śābari sarva vyādhi hariṇi muni muni cuṇḍi cuṇḍi cuṇḍini cuṇḍini mahācuṇḍini

original: nimi nimi nimiṃdhari trailokyavardhani trilokajanani trilokālokakari traidhātukavyavalokani
analyzed: nimi nimi nimiṃdhari trailokya vardhani triloka janani triloka āloka kari traidhātuka vyavalokani

original: vajraparaśupāśamuṣalakhaḍgacakratriśūlacintāmaṇimakuṭamahāvidyādhāriṇi rakṣa rakṣa
analyzed: vajra paraśu pāśa muṣala khaḍga cakra triśūla cintāmaṇi makuṭa mahāvidyā dhāriṇi rakṣa rakṣa

original: māṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca sarvasthānagata sarvaduṣṭabhayebhyaḥ sarvamanuṣyāmanuṣyabhayebhyaḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ /
analyzed: mām sarva sattvān ca sarva sthāna gata sarva duṣṭa bhayebhyaḥ sarva manuṣya amanuṣya bhayebhyaḥ sarva vyādhibhyaḥ

original: vajre vajre vajravati vajradhare vajrapāṇidhare hiri hiri mili mili kili kili cili cili śili śili cala cala vala vala varade (Pkdh_142)
analyzed: vajre vajre vajravati vajradhare vajrapāṇidhare hiri hiri mili mili kili kili cili cili śili śili cala cala vala vala varade

original: varadāṃkuśe sarvatra jayalabdhe svāhā /
analyzed: varadā aṃkuśe sarvatra jaya labdhe svāhā

original: sarvapāpavidāriṇi svāhā /
analyzed: sarva pāpa vidāriṇi svāhā

original: sarvavyādhihariṇi svāhā /
analyzed: sarva vyādhi hariṇi svāhā

original: garbhasaṃbharaṇi svāhā /
analyzed: garbha saṃbharaṇi svāhā

original: sarvatra bhayaharaṇi svāhā /
analyzed: sarvatra bhaya haraṇi svāhā

original: svasti bhavatu mama sarvasattvānāñ ca svāhā /
analyzed: svasti bhavatu mama sarva sattvānām ca svāhā

original: oṃ bhuvaḥ svāhā /
analyzed: om bhuvaḥ svāhā

original: svasti svāhā /
analyzed: svasti svāhā

original: śānti svāhā /
analyzed: śānti svāhā

original: puṣṭi svāhā /
analyzed: puṣṭi svāhā

original: balavarddhani svāhā /
analyzed: bala varddhani svāhā

original: oṃ jayatu jayavati jayakamale vimale svāhā /
analyzed: om jayatu jayavati jaya kamale vimale svāhā

original: vipule svāhā /
analyzed: vipule svāhā

original: sarvatathāgatamūrte svāhā /
analyzed: sarva tathāgata mūrte svāhā

original: oṃ bhūri mahāśānte svāhā /
analyzed: om bhūri mahāśānte svāhā

original: oṃ bhuḥ bhūri bhūri vajravati sarvatathāgatahṛdayapūraṇi āyuḥsandhāraṇi bale balavati /
analyzed: om bhuḥ bhūri bhūri vajravati sarva tathāgata hṛdaya pūraṇi āyuḥ sandhāraṇi bale balavati

original: oṃ jayavijaye hūm hūṃ phaṭ /
analyzed: om jayavijaye hūm hūm phaṭ

original: oṃ maṇidhari vajriṇi hūm hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
analyzed: om maṇidhari vajriṇi hūm hūm phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: oṃ maṇivajre hṛdayavajre mārasainyavidrāvaṇi hana hana sarvaśatrūn vajragarbhe trāsaya trāsaya sarvamārabhavanāni hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ saṃbhara  #
analyzed: om maṇivajre hṛdaya vajre māra sainya vidrāvaṇi hana hana sarva śatrūn vajragarbhe trāsaya trāsaya sarva māra bhavanāni hūm hūm phaṭ phaṭ saṃbhara

original: saṃbhara svāhā /
analyzed: saṃbhara svāhā

original: buddhamaitrī sarvatathāgatavajrakalpādhiṣṭhite sarvakarmāvaraṇāny apanaye svāhā /
analyzed: buddha maitrī sarva tathāgata vajra kalpa dhiṣṭhite sarva karma āvaraṇāni apanaye svāhā

original: // āryapratisarākalpadhāraṇī samāptā //
analyzed: ārya pratisarākalpadhāraṇī samāptā
